messages.subject: Vid Response on Youtube
messages.msgSnippet: Just to follow up on this post http://groups.yahoo.com/group/SHQ/message/3323 dax from http://www.ai-dax.com who donated our
messages.messageBody:
Just to follow up on this post
http://groups.yahoo.com/group/SHQ/message/3323

"dax" from http://www.ai-dax.com who donated our
http://shinsengumihq.livejournal.com layout fixed the technical issue
and now you can all the posts again. Dax is a professional
illustrator and graphic designer of the highest caliber, please seek
her for all your art needs.

----------------------------

Today I received an exciting message via youtube and it is a video
response from someone who made a slide show:

this vid http://jp.youtube.com//watch?v=1yiF_PYZB2o
*yes it has Shinsengumi cosplayers
*yes it takes place at Aizu
*yes is has SONNY CHIBA in it (if you aren't familiar with Japanese
film---Sonny Chiba also starred in Kill Bill vol 1 and probably 1.5
million samurai/ninja related films)

was requested to be attached to this vid
http://uk.youtube.com/watch?v=Y1IIo4o3beo a pretty old Byakkotai
tribute I made a long timg ago

of all the vids I made for the Shinsengumi, Byakkotai etc
by far the Joushitai (AIzu Samurai Women's Brigade) is by far the
most popular (*_*)

but ofcourse, we have yet to see a manga or anime incorporate all
these groups together

and fortunately no HOllywood company has found them yet XD
